channel.title: [help]-[exception]-[rep++|help]
channel.description:
[code]Connecting connected to update server loading custom spirts part 1 loading custom spirts part 2 Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method34(client.java:1835) at client.method146(client.java:13995) at client.method109(client.java:9238) at client.method9(client.java):10437) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_sub1.java:127) at client.run(client.java:5355) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
I'm getting that everytime i'm trying to attack an npc. if you need to see any method or something just post here what u need...
